title: Alleged Meduza Stealer malware admins arrested after hacking Russian org

content.raw: The Russian authorities have arrested three individuals in Moscow who are believed to be the creators and operators of the Meduza Stealer information-stealing malware. [...]

analysis.summary: Russian authorities arrested three individuals in Moscow believed to be the creators and operators of the Meduza Stealer information-stealing malware, which is used to harvest credentials and sensitive data from victims.
